Tickets booking API API documentation version v1

/events

/events get post

get

Retrieve events list

post

Creates new event

get /events

Retrieve events list

  • Response

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

post /events

Creates new event

  • Request
  • Response

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Event creation",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "name": {
      "description": "Event name",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "date": {
      "description": "Date if event",
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date-time"
    },
    "required": ["name", "date"]
  }
}

HTTP status code 201

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Event description",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "url": {
      "description": "Link to event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "id": {        
      "description": "Event id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "name": {
      "description": "Event name",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "date": {
      "description": "Date if event",
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date-time"
    },
    "ticketsUrl": {
      "description": "Link to tickets",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "ticketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "freeTicketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "required": ["url", "id", "name", "date", "ticketsUrl", "ticketsAmount", "freeTicketsAmount"]
  }
}

HTTP status code 422

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Error description",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "message": {
      "description": "Error message",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "erorrs": {
      "properties": {
        "field": {
          "description": "Field name",
          "type": "string"
        },
        "code": {
          "description": "Error code",
          "type": "string"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "required": ["message"]
}

/events/{eventId} get put

get

Retrieve scpecific event details

put

Update event properties

get /events/{eventId}

Retrieve scpecific event details

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • eventId: required (string)

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Event description",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "url": {
      "description": "Link to event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "id": {        
      "description": "Event id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "name": {
      "description": "Event name",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "date": {
      "description": "Date if event",
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date-time"
    },
    "ticketsUrl": {
      "description": "Link to tickets",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "ticketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "freeTicketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "required": ["url", "id", "name", "date", "ticketsUrl", "ticketsAmount", "freeTicketsAmount"]
  }
}

put /events/{eventId}

Update event properties

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • eventId: required (string)

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Event description",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "url": {
      "description": "Link to event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "id": {        
      "description": "Event id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "name": {
      "description": "Event name",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "date": {
      "description": "Date if event",
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date-time"
    },
    "ticketsUrl": {
      "description": "Link to tickets",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "ticketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "freeTicketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "required": ["url", "id", "name", "date", "ticketsUrl", "ticketsAmount", "freeTicketsAmount"]
  }
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Event description",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "url": {
      "description": "Link to event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "id": {        
      "description": "Event id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "name": {
      "description": "Event name",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "date": {
      "description": "Date if event",
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date-time"
    },
    "ticketsUrl": {
      "description": "Link to tickets",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "ticketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "freeTicketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "required": ["url", "id", "name", "date", "ticketsUrl", "ticketsAmount", "freeTicketsAmount"]
  }
}

HTTP status code 422

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Error description",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "message": {
      "description": "Error message",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "erorrs": {
      "properties": {
        "field": {
          "description": "Field name",
          "type": "string"
        },
        "code": {
          "description": "Error code",
          "type": "string"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "required": ["message"]
}

/events/{eventId}/tickets get post

get

Retrieve a list of tickets for specified eventId

post

Create tickets amount for event

get /events/{eventId}/tickets

Retrieve a list of tickets for specified eventId

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • eventId: required (string)

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "description": "Tickets list information",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "hits": {
      "decription": "List length",
      "type": "integer"  
    },
    "tickets": {
      "descriptions": "Tickets list",
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {        
          "id": {
            "description": "Ticket id",
            "type": "integer",
            "required": true
          },
          "ticketUrl": {
            "description": "Link to ticket",
            "type": "string",
            "required": true
          },
          "details": {
            "description": "Any ticket details",
            "type": "string"  
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "hits": 3,
  "tickets": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "ticketUrl": "tickets/1",
      "details": "Sector A",
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "ticketUrl": "tickets/2",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "ticketUrl": "tickets/3",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
  ]
}

post /events/{eventId}/tickets

Create tickets amount for event

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • eventId: required (string)

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Ticket creation",
  "type" : "Object",
  "properties": {
    "price": {
      "description": "Ticket price",
      "type": "number"
    },
    "amount": {
      "description": "Amount of tickets for specified price",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 1
    },
    "details": {      
      "description": "Any ticket details",
      "type": "string"  
    }
  },
  "required": ["price"]
}

HTTP status code 201

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "description": "Tickets list information",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "hits": {
      "decription": "List length",
      "type": "integer"  
    },
    "tickets": {
      "descriptions": "Tickets list",
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {        
          "id": {
            "description": "Ticket id",
            "type": "integer",
            "required": true
          },
          "ticketUrl": {
            "description": "Link to ticket",
            "type": "string",
            "required": true
          },
          "details": {
            "description": "Any ticket details",
            "type": "string"  
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "hits": 3,
  "tickets": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "ticketUrl": "tickets/1",
      "details": "Sector A",
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "ticketUrl": "tickets/2",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "ticketUrl": "tickets/3",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
  ]
}

/tickets

/tickets/{ticketId} get patch delete

get

Retrieve ticket information

patch

Modify ticket status

delete

Delete specified ticket

get /tickets/{ticketId}

Retrieve ticket information

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • ticketId: required (string)

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Ticket description",
  "type" : "Object",
  "properties": {
    "url": {
      "description": "Link to ticket",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "id": {
      "description": "ticket id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "owner": {
      "description": "Owner username",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "eventName": {
      "description": "Name of event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "eventUrl": {
      "description": "Link to event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "details": {
      "description": "Any ticket details",
      "type": "string"  
    },
    "price": {
      "description": "Ticket price",
      "type": "number"
    },
    "status": {
      "description": "Ticket status",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["free", "pending", "sold"]
    }
  },
  "required": ["url", "id", "owner", "eventName", "eventUrl", "price", "status"]
}

Example:

{
  "url": "/tickets/2",
  "id": 2,
  "owner": "bob",
  "eventName": "Very interesting event",
  "eventUrl": "events/1",
  "price": 35.5,
  "status": "free"
}

patch /tickets/{ticketId}

Modify ticket status

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • ticketId: required (string)

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Ticket modification",
  "type" : "Object",
  "properties": {
    "id": {
      "description": "ticket id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "owner": {
      "description": "Owner username",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "status": {
      "description": "Ticket status",
      "type": "string" 
    }
  },
  "required": ["id"]
}

Example:

{
  "id": 2,
  "owner": "bob",
  "status": "sold"
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Ticket description",
  "type" : "Object",
  "properties": {
    "url": {
      "description": "Link to ticket",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "id": {
      "description": "ticket id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "owner": {
      "description": "Owner username",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "eventName": {
      "description": "Name of event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "eventUrl": {
      "description": "Link to event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "details": {
      "description": "Any ticket details",
      "type": "string"  
    },
    "price": {
      "description": "Ticket price",
      "type": "number"
    },
    "status": {
      "description": "Ticket status",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["free", "pending", "sold"]
    }
  },
  "required": ["url", "id", "owner", "eventName", "eventUrl", "price", "status"]
}

Example:

{
  "url": "/tickets/2",
  "id": 2,
  "owner": "bob",
  "eventName": "Very interesting event",
  "eventUrl": "events/1",
  "price": 35.5,
  "status": "free"
}

delete /tickets/{ticketId}

Delete specified ticket

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • ticketId: required (string)

HTTP status code 204

/users

/users/{userId}/tickets get

get

Retrieve all tickets for specified userId

get /users/{userId}/tickets

Retrieve all tickets for specified userId

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string)

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "description": "Tickets list information",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "hits": {
      "decription": "List length",
      "type": "integer"  
    },
    "tickets": {
      "descriptions": "Tickets list",
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {        
          "id": {
            "description": "Ticket id",
            "type": "integer",
            "required": true
          },
          "ticketUrl": {
            "description": "Link to ticket",
            "type": "string",
            "required": true
          },
          "details": {
            "description": "Any ticket details",
            "type": "string"  
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "hits": 3,
  "tickets": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "ticketUrl": "tickets/1",
      "details": "Sector A",
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "ticketUrl": "tickets/2",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "ticketUrl": "tickets/3",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
  ]
}
